title: Investment Giant Vanguard Blocks Clients From Buying Bitcoin ETFs
description: Vanguard, one of the largest asset managers in the world, is preventing customers from buying the newly approved bitcoin ETFs.

title: Balaji Srinivasan Equates Bitcoin ETF Move to Reversal of FDR’s Historic Gold Seizure
description: The sanctioning of U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) heralds a transformative shift from a century-long dominance of centralized monetary systems to the emerging realm of decentralized finance, as opined by Balaji Srinivasan, a distinguished figure in technology and the crypto industry. Srinivasan equates this shift to a reversal of the historical Executive Order 6102, […]

title: NEAR Price Prediction 2024-2033: Is the NEAR Protocol a Good Investment?
description: NEAR Price Prediction 2024-2033 Near Protocol (NEAR) is a blockchain platform with significant attention and partnerships within the cryptocurrency industry. title: Vanguard is never going to offer spot Bitcoin ETFs
description: Vanguard, a behemoth in the asset management industry, wielding a staggering $7.7 trillion, has unequivocally stated its stance: “No spot Bitcoin ETFs, thank you very much.” This decision emerges amidst a flurry of activity in the cryptocurrency sector, particularly with the advent of these newfangled Bitcoin investment products. title: The real impact of the spot Bitcoin ETF on investors
description: The recent approval of the first batch of spot Bitcoin ETFs (exchange-traded funds) by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is nothing short of a watershed moment in the financial world. This groundbreaking development involves heavyweight sponsors like BlackRock, Invesco, Fidelity, Grayscale, and Ark Invest. With a swift nod from the SEC, these Bitcoin […]

title: Leadership Change at StarkWare: Uri Kolodny Steps Down as CEO
description: Uri Kolodny, the CEO of StarkWare Ltd., has announced his decision to step down from his role due to pressing family health issues.  The move comes after Kolodny had previously taken a leave of absence a year ago, which he now acknowledges was insufficient for the challenges he faces at home. title: Zeitgeist and Polkassembly Join Forces to Transform Decision Making at Polkadot
description: The Zeitgeist-Polkassembly integration enhances Polkadot’s governance, allowing users to forecast decisions and earn financial gains, incentivizing community participation and engagement. Participating in Polkadot decisions becomes exciting with Zeitgeist, where users, by forecasting outcomes, gain direct financial incentives, maximizing community interaction. Zeitgeist, Polkadot’s prediction marketplace, has announced an integration with Polkassembly. This initiative aims to transform [...]
